name: Tank Riders 3
description:
The 153rd Tiny Tank battalion is back! Now with upgraded tanks and enemies, so prepare for action.
It's solely up to you to attack hordes of oncoming baddies with an arsenal of cannons, missiles and mortars!
Bounce shots off walls to hit lurking enemies before they have a chance to attack!
Blast through walls and charge ahead, or find hidden paths to sneak up on enemies unawares!
And make sure to destroy those damn hives ...

You also have the ability to face off against friends and foes in frenzied game-center multiplayer battles ensures an experience that will stay fresh and fun for a long time!

- 100 brand new action paced, tricky & taxing levels, with many more on the way
- Classic campaigns, with 25 levels from earlier versions of the game with new upgraded looks.
- Realtime multiplayer support, play with friends or players around the world.
- MFi Gamepad support.
- Fully customizable touch-input.

A steady stream of new campaigns will be available for download.
